products.title: Vintage IBM Model M Keyboard (1989)
products.description: Classic mechanical keyboard from IBM's golden era. Features the legendary buckling spring switches. Fully restored and USB-converted. A piece of computing history that still outperforms modern keyboards.

products.title: Original Fort Collins Sugar Beet Scale
products.description: Authentic industrial scale from the old Fort Collins Sugar Beet factory (circa 1903). A rare piece of local history, fully restored and functional. Perfect for display or conversation piece.

products.title: Apple Macintosh SE/30 (1989)
products.description: Fully working Macintosh SE/30 with original 40MB hard drive and 4MB RAM. Includes original keyboard and mouse. Recently serviced and capacitors replaced.

products.title: Horsetooth Rock Survey Equipment (1950s)
products.description: Original surveying transit used in the 1950s Horsetooth area development. Brass construction with leather case. A unique piece of local surveying history.

products.title: Commodore 64 Complete System
products.description: Working Commodore 64 with 1541 disk drive, monitor, and original software collection. The best-selling computer model of all time, ready for retro gaming.

products.title: CSU Veterinary School Microscope (1960s)
products.description: Professional-grade microscope from CSU's early veterinary program. Zeiss optics, excellent condition. Includes original wooden case and accessories.

products.title: Vintage New Belgium Brewing Equipment
products.description: Original small-batch brewing equipment from New Belgium's early days. Includes copper vessels and original thermometers. A piece of Fort Collins brewing history.

products.title: Silicon Graphics Indigo2 Workstation
products.description: Professional 3D graphics workstation from the 90s. Used in early CGI production. Fully functional with original software.

products.title: Antique Colorado A&M College Sign
products.description: Original metal sign from when CSU was still Colorado A&M College (pre-1957). Excellent condition with original paint and mounting hardware.

products.title: HP-35 Scientific Calculator
products.description: The world's first scientific pocket calculator from HP (1972). Fully functional with original case and manual. A cornerstone of Silicon Valley history.

products.title: Fort Collins Trolley Conductor's Bell
products.description: Authentic conductor's bell from the Fort Collins trolley system (early 1900s). Brass construction with original patina.

products.title: NeXT Computer System
products.description: Complete NeXT Computer system from Steve Jobs' other company. The platform where the first web browser was developed. Includes original monitor and accessories.

products.title: Horsetooth Marina Diving Equipment
products.description: Vintage scuba gear used by early Horsetooth Reservoir maintenance divers. Includes original regulators and depth gauges from the 1960s.

products.title: Sun SPARCstation 20
products.description: High-end Unix workstation from the mid-90s. Popular in scientific and engineering applications. Includes original keyboard and mouse.

products.title: Original Hewlett-Packard Oscilloscope
products.description: HP 120B oscilloscope from the company's early days. Fully functional and calibrated. A testament to HP's engineering excellence.
